Up for sale are a couple HOF portrait cards. Shipping is included in the price shown. Please drop me an email if interested. 

Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Psa 3 T206 Joe Tinker portrait - [STRIKE]$595 [/STRIKE] - SOLD

Sgc 3.5 T206 John Mcgraw - [STRIKE]$440[/STRIKE] - SOLD (or you can make a fair offer which I may consider) 
(card has a crease stemming from the bottom border upward into the "Y" on his chest) otherwise displays EX-MT
